name: Beizu Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Shanyin Beizu Coal Industry Co., Ltd.

The Beizu Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in the western part of Beizu Village, Yujing Town, Shanyin County, Shuozhou City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Shanyin Beizu Coal Industry Co., Ltd.
owners: Shanxi Shanyin Beizu Coal Industry Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The Beizu Coal Mine is operated and owned by Shanxi Shanyin Beizu Coal Industry Co., Ltd.
